attributes.action: Ban HGV's from overtaking HGV's on motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HGV's are restricted to 56 mph - all modern HGV’s vehicles are powerful and even when fully loaded can sustain this speed on all sections of Britain’s motorways - it is therefore impossible for one to overtake another unless they speed or crawl past each other for mile after mile - therefore in the interests of safety and to improve traffic flow they should be banned from overtaking each other

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
